content:
I'm glad to hear that your pearl drops turned out well with the soft cloth and mild soap! Pearls can be delicate, so it's great that you took gentle care of them.

And I'm happy to have been able to help with your opal jewelry cleaning concerns! Remember to always handle your opal jewelry with care, and use gentle cleaning methods and products specifically designed for opals.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy cleaning and enjoy your beautiful jewelry pieces!
